translations: adj.使人恼怒的，惹人生气的

phrs.translation: 可气, 激怒人的, 气死人的, 别可气

sentences.sentence: Herrera could be exasperating to his colleagues.
sentences.translation: 赫雷拉对他的同事来说可以是恼人的。

sentences.sentence: To see my body literally wither away before my eyes was exasperating.
sentences.translation: 看着我的身体在自己的眼前日渐虚弱真是让人恼火。

sentences.sentence: It is really exasperating that he has not turned up when the train is about to leave.
sentences.translation: 火车快开了，他还不来，实在急人。
